Text.val: 15.09.2014 JH SCR19151 Changed usage of CDSE table into DEPS table

ExpSyntax.val: 'Difference found by BMN505 , please check jobjournal'

'exists(select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEPS where DEPS_CDEP_TYPE = CDEP_TYPE and DEPS_HOFF_CODE = '&ASCIIChr (39)& Trim({0,4}) &ASCIIChr (39)& 'and DEPS_FACTORINGACC = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'N'&ASCIIChr (39)&') and CDEP_TYPE <> 4 and CDEP_TYPE <> 5'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_WAITFORAPPROVAL = 'N' and CDEP_WAITFORSTARTDATE = 'N' and :4
